Field.Label: If you'd like to be notified via email when new versions of the SenseME Fan plugin become available, enable this option.
Enter the email address at which you'd like to be notified of plugin version updates.
If you are having problems with the plugin (or you are instructed by support), you can enable extra logging in the Event Log window by checking this button. Use with caution.

If the plugin is having trouble remaining connected to the fan (triggers don't execute) then adjusting this value may help. If non-zero then the plugin will attempt to re-establish its connection with each fan after this many minutes of inactivity. A value of 0 will disable this feature. Note that you must restart the plugin for changes to this to take effect.
